benchmark_details.name: NextQuAD
benchmark_details.overview: NextQuAD is a comprehensive open-domain dataset for Persian designed to enhance the performance of question answering systems, containing 7,515 contexts and 23,918 pairs of question and answer.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a high-quality question answering dataset in Persian to improve the design and functionality of QA systems for non-English languages.

data.source: Data was gathered through translation of SQuAD 2.0, question-answer pairs from a game application called 'Quiz of Kings', and manual data collection from well-known Persian websites.
data.size: 7,515 contexts and 23,918 pairs of question and answer
data.annotation: The dataset was manually reviewed and cross-validated, involving crowdworkers who contributed to the creation and annotation of the question-answer pairs.

methodology.calculation: EM is calculated based on the exact match of responses with the ground truth answers; F1 Score is computed similarly considering both precision and recall.
methodology.interpretation: A higher Exact Match and F1 Score indicate better performance of the QA system. Values close to 1.0 signify high accuracy in answering.
methodology.baseline_results: The model achieved 0.95 Exact Match and 0.97 F1 Score on the evaluation dataset.
methodology.validation: K-fold cross-validation with five folds was employed.
